paragraphs.text: Rape culture on campus: The silence of men.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: There are some voices that have been conspicuously absent since the publication of Sabrina Rubin Erdely's Rolling Stone article "A Rape on Campus: A Brutal Assault and a Struggle for Justice at UVA."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Administrators at UVA were forced to respond to the allegations of a 2012 gang rape at the Phi Kappa Psi fraternity
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: women came out in force to share their stories of sexual violence on campus
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Erdely received so much testimony from women on the UVA campus about the rape culture that she wrote a follow-up article "Rape at UVA: Readers Say Jackie Wasn't Alone."
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the fraternities on campus have been silent as a whole
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And this is not only a UVA problem
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: rape culture, often cantered in the hypermasculine environment of fraternities, is an epidemic at colleges across the US
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Gregory Orr, who has taught at UVA for the past 39 years, argued:"Fraternity culture is about as deeply implicated in misogyny and other prejudicial evils as you can imagine."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: In September, New York Magazine ran a feature"Meet the College Women Who Are Starting a Revolution Against Campus Sexual Assault" that included the story of Emma Sulkowicz
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: She is a Columbia University student who, in response to being raped and seeing inaction on the part of her university to seek justice, strapped a mattress to her back and vowed to walk around campus until her rapist was expelled
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Women like Sulkowicz and Jackie (the victim at UVA) are insulted, mistreated, and ignored by the university administration
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: until
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they take their stories public
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In many of these stories of sexual violence, the victims are transformed into activists
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But where are the men, and in particular, where are the fraternity brothers?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the case of Jackie, seven fraternity brothers participated in the rape while two watched
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it took place at a fraternity party
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: We know that there were witnesses
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and yet the fraternity and its members have been silent
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: some critics are calling for an end to Greek life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I ask that fraternity brothers speak out about sexual violence
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: which has been widely documented across the country, and act in solidarity with victims of violence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I reached out to several fraternity brothers on the UVA campus for interviews
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I got only one response
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: "I'm sure you're aware of the moratorium the IFC placed on fraternities in regards to speaking to journalists about the Rolling Stone article."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: The IFC should take this moment to promote open dialogue about sexual violence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: this requires admitting that the documented culture of sexual violence in fraternities has validity
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: that fraternity brothers have been complicit in a culture that shames and silences rape victims
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Across the board denial of any mistreatment of women seems to be the modus operandi of fraternities
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: One fraternity brother at UVA agreed to speak to me as long as I didn't use his name or identify his fraternity
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: He said:"The only times I've ever seen or heard of disrespect towards women happening at our fraternity house was at the hand of non-brothers, and they were promptly thrown out."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: To say the least
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I find this hard to believe
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Stories of disrespect towards women at fraternities or elsewhere on campus abound not only at UVA, but nationwide
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Fraternity culture is a vestige of the past, of a money and power pipeline that installs men into a network that protects and provides for them for life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they are loyal
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: That power was on display when UVA made a choice about hiring an "independent" investigator to look into the gang rape allegations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Lawyer Mark Filip was selected to lead the independent investigation, this despite the fact that he was a member of the Phi Kappa Psi fraternity, the very same one whose members were accused of gang rape
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: He was later recused from the case
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Fraternity culture also represents antiquated values about gender
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: on the UVA campus it manifests itself in a system in which fraternities have a monopoly on serving alcohol(drinking is not allowed at sororities)
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: This installs fraternities at the very centre of college drinking and socialisation culture
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I wish I was writing the article,"Meet the College Fraternity Brothers Who Are Starting a Revolution Against Campus Sexual Assault,"
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: that would mean that fraternities would have to quickly usher themselves into the 21st century
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All it takes is a few inspired, outspoken individuals to start a movement against sexual violence, as victims of sexual violence have shown
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is time for fraternity brothers to join them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: to use their strength and numbers to speak out against rape culture and work to change it
paragraphs.label: assumption
